id.Description: unique project-wide ID to uniquely identify and track objects

activateManualSource.Description: Activates Fixed Manual Setpoint (Activation by Program)

activateDynamicSource.Description: Activates Internal Dynamic Setpoint (Activation by Program)

activateFixedSource.Description: Activates Internal Fixed Setpoint (Activation by Program)

dynamicSource.Description: Dynamic Source from Program (for example from PID controller)

fixedSource.Description: Fixed Source from Program (for example from a Phase/Sequence control)

simulateDelay.Description: Simulated delay to set the feedback signals, in s

permitIn.Description: permission to control. Does not activate safe position. 1 = no permission

protectIn.Description: Protect, sets safe position, sets protectState. 1 = Protect active

PermEn.Description: Enables the Permission Lock. 1 = enabled (info for HMI)

Permit.Description: Permit, allows control. Does not activate safe position. 1 = permission given

IntlEn.Description: Enables the Interlock Lock. 1 = enabled (info for HMI)

PermEn.Comment: Always Enable, Configure permitIn = 0 if no permits

IntlEn.Comment: Always Enable, Configure interlockIn = 0 if no interlocks

ProtEn.Comment: Always Enable, Configure protectIn = 0 if no protections

Interlock.Comment: Normalize logic so it's easier to build complex interlocks

Protect.Comment: Set (reset because inverted logic) happens inside MTP block

fbOpenSimulated.Comment: if no FbOpen connected then treat it as a simulation

fbCloseSimulated.Comment: if no FbClose connected then treat it as a simulation

OpenFbk.Expression: (feedbackOpen AND NOT OpenFbkCalc) OR (fbOpenSimulated AND OpenFbkCalc)

CloseFbk.Expression: (feedbackClose AND NOT CloseFbkCalc) OR (fbCloseSimulated AND CloseFbkCalc)

PosUnit.Comment: Fixed on % (TODO: look up int value for %)

reset.Comment: reset = False at the end of the FB

activateManualSource.Comment: reset activateManualSource at the end of the FB

activateDynamicSource.Comment: reset activateDynamicSource at the end of the FB

activateFixedSource.Comment: reset activateFixedSource at the end of the FB

id.Description: unique project-wide ID to uniquely identify and track objects

risingEdge.Description: Input value transitioned from low to high

fallingEdge.Description: Input value transitioned from high to low

lastValue.Description: Value from last scan, for edge detection

lastValue.Comment: copy value to lastValue at the end of the block

IntlEn.Comment: Always Enable, Configure interlockIn = 0 if no interlocks

Protect.Comment: Set (reset because inverted logic) happens inside MTP block

StopAut.Expression: (NOT forward AND NOT reverse) OR stop

FwdFbk.Expression: (forwardFeedback AND NOT FwdFbkCalc) OR (fwdFbkSimulated AND FwdFbkCalc)

RevFbk.Expression: (reverseFeedback AND NOT RevFbkCalc) OR (revFbkSimulated AND RevFbkCalc)

reset.Comment: reset = False at the end of the FB

stop.Comment: stop = False at the end of the FB
